189a624ca4fd8df46b23bc5d190dd07f08065cf5:
mutation CreateCourse($name: String!, $displayName: String!, $description: String, $color: String, $startDate: Date!, $endDate: Date!, $isGroupCreationEnabled: Boolean!, $groupDeadlineDate: Date!, $maxGroupSize: Int!, $preferredGroupSize: Int!, $notificationEmail: String, $isGamificationEnabled: Boolean!) {
  createCourse(
    name: $name
    displayName: $displayName
    description: $description
    color: $color
    startDate: $startDate
    endDate: $endDate
    isGroupCreationEnabled: $isGroupCreationEnabled
    groupDeadlineDate: $groupDeadlineDate
    maxGroupSize: $maxGroupSize
    preferredGroupSize: $preferredGroupSize
    notificationEmail: $notificationEmail
    isGamificationEnabled: $isGamificationEnabled
  ) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    startDate
    endDate
    isGroupCreationEnabled
    groupDeadlineDate
    maxGroupSize
    preferredGroupSize
    notificationEmail
    isGamificationEnabled
    __typename
  }
}
9c85b7f85dedb882046baca8e77b538259689861:
mutation CreateGroupActivity($name: String!, $displayName: String!, $description: String, $courseId: String!, $multiplier: Int!, $startDate: Date!, $endDate: Date!, $clues: [GroupActivityClueInput!]!, $stack: ElementStackInput!) {

    courseId: $courseId
    multiplier: $multiplier
    startDate: $startDate
    endDate: $endDate
    clues: $clues
    stack: $stack
  ) {

    description
    scheduledStartAt
    scheduledEndAt
    pointsMultiplier
    __typename
  }
}
971361070fb7c45eec4d26589917b0d7bc02414d:
fragment ElementData on ElementInstance {
  elementData {
    ... on ChoicesElementData {
      __typename
      id
      elementId
      name
      type
      content
      explanation
      pointsMultiplier
      options {
        hasSampleSolution
        displayMode
        choices {
          ix
          correct
          feedback
          value
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
    }
    ... on NumericalElementData {
      __typename
      id
      elementId
      name
      type
      content
      explanation
      pointsMultiplier
      options {
        hasSampleSolution
        accuracy
        placeholder
        unit
        restrictions {
          min
          max
          __typename
        }
        solutionRanges {
          min
          max
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
    }
    ... on FreeTextElementData {
      __typename
      id
      elementId
      name
      type
      content
      explanation
      pointsMultiplier
      options {
        hasSampleSolution
        restrictions {
          maxLength
          __typename
        }
        solutions
        __typename
      }
    }
    ... on FlashcardElementData {
      __typename
      id
      elementId
      name
      type
      content
      explanation
      pointsMultiplier
    }
    ... on ContentElementData {
      __typename
      id
      elementId
      name
      type
      content
      explanation
      pointsMultiplier
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
mutation CreatePracticeQuiz($name: String!, $displayName: String!, $description: String, $stacks: [ElementStackInput!]!, $courseId: String!, $multiplier: Int!, $order: ElementOrderType!, $availableFrom: Date, $resetTimeDays: Int!) {
  createPracticeQuiz(
    name: $name
    displayName: $displayName
    description: $description
    stacks: $stacks
    courseId: $courseId
    multiplier: $multiplier
    order: $order
    availableFrom: $availableFrom
    resetTimeDays: $resetTimeDays
  ) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    description
    pointsMultiplier
    resetTimeDays
    orderType
    course {
      id
      __typename
    }
    stacks {
      id
      displayName
      description
      elements {
        id
        ...ElementData
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

mutation CreateSession($name: String!, $displayName: String!, $description: String, $blocks: [BlockInput!]!, $courseId: String, $multiplier: Int!, $maxBonusPoints: Int!, $timeToZeroBonus: Int!, $isGamificationEnabled: Boolean!, $isConfusionFeedbackEnabled: Boolean!, $isLiveQAEnabled: Boolean!, $isModerationEnabled: Boolean!) {
  createSession(
    name: $name
    displayName: $displayName
    description: $description
    blocks: $blocks
    courseId: $courseId
    multiplier: $multiplier
    maxBonusPoints: $maxBonusPoints
    timeToZeroBonus: $timeToZeroBonus
    isGamificationEnabled: $isGamificationEnabled
    isConfusionFeedbackEnabled: $isConfusionFeedbackEnabled
    isLiveQAEnabled: $isLiveQAEnabled
    isModerationEnabled: $isModerationEnabled
  ) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    description
    blocks {
      id
      status
      timeLimit
      instances {
        id
        ...QuestionDataInfo
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    course {
      id
      __typename
    }
    pointsMultiplier
    isGamificationEnabled
    isConfusionFeedbackEnabled
    isLiveQAEnabled
    isModerationEnabled
    __typename
  }
}

439afbadfc37921ade32e35d6457591a18dcb964:
fragment StackFeedbackEvaluations on StackFeedback {
  evaluations {
    __typename
    ... on ChoicesInstanceEvaluation {
      __typename
      elementType
      instanceId
      pointsMultiplier
      explanation
      feedbacks {
        ix
        feedback
        correct
        value
        __typename
      }
      choices
      numAnswers
      score
      xp
      pointsAwarded
      percentile
      newPointsFrom
      xpAwarded
      newXpFrom
      correctness
      lastResponse {
        __typename
        choices
      }
    }
    ... on NumericalInstanceEvaluation {
      __typename
      elementType
      instanceId
      pointsMultiplier
      explanation
      feedbacks {
        ix
        feedback
        correct
        value
        __typename
      }
      numAnswers
      answers
      score
      xp
      pointsAwarded
      percentile
      newPointsFrom
      xpAwarded
      newXpFrom
      solutionRanges {
        __typename
        min
        max
      }
      lastResponse {
        __typename
        value
      }
      correctness
    }
    ... on FreeTextInstanceEvaluation {
      instanceId
      elementType
      pointsMultiplier
      explanation
      feedbacks {
        ix
        feedback
        correct
        value
        __typename
      }
      numAnswers
      answers
      score
      xp
      pointsAwarded
      percentile
      newPointsFrom
      xpAwarded
      newXpFrom
      solutions
      lastResponse {
        __typename
        value
      }
      correctness
      __typename
    }
    ... on FlashcardInstanceEvaluation {
      instanceId
      elementType
      pointsMultiplier
      explanation
      feedbacks {
        ix
        feedback
        correct
        value
        __typename
      }
      numAnswers
      score
      xp
      pointsAwarded
      percentile
      newPointsFrom
      xpAwarded
      newXpFrom
      lastResponse {
        __typename
        correctness
      }
      correctness
      __typename
    }
    ... on ContentInstanceEvaluation {
      instanceId
      elementType
      pointsMultiplier
      explanation
      feedbacks {
        ix
        feedback
        correct
        value
        __typename
      }
      numAnswers
      score
      xp
      pointsAwarded
      percentile
      newPointsFrom
      xpAwarded
      newXpFrom
      lastResponse {
        __typename
        viewed
      }
      correctness
      __typename
    }
  }
  __typename
}
mutation RespondToElementStack($stackId: Int!, $courseId: String!, $responses: [StackResponseInput!]!, $stackAnswerTime: Int!) {
  respondToElementStack(
    stackId: $stackId
    courseId: $courseId
    responses: $responses
    stackAnswerTime: $stackAnswerTime
  ) {
    id
    status
    score
    ...StackFeedbackEvaluations
    __typename
  }
}

mutation UpdateCourseSettings($id: String!, $name: String, $displayName: String, $description: String, $color: String, $startDate: Date, $endDate: Date, $isGroupCreationEnabled: Boolean, $groupDeadlineDate: Date, $notificationEmail: String, $isGamificationEnabled: Boolean) {

    id: $id
    name: $name
    displayName: $displayName
    description: $description
    color: $color
    startDate: $startDate
    endDate: $endDate
    isGroupCreationEnabled: $isGroupCreationEnabled
    groupDeadlineDate: $groupDeadlineDate
    notificationEmail: $notificationEmail
    isGamificationEnabled: $isGamificationEnabled
  ) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    startDate
    endDate
    isGroupCreationEnabled
    groupDeadlineDate
    notificationEmail
    isGamificationEnabled
    __typename
  }
}

query GetCockpitSession($id: String!) {
  cockpitSession(id: $id) {
    id
    isLiveQAEnabled
    isConfusionFeedbackEnabled
    isModerationEnabled
    isGamificationEnabled
    namespace
    name
    displayName
    status
    startedAt
    course {
      id
      displayName
      __typename
    }
    blocks {
      id
      numOfParticipants
      order
      status
      expiresAt
      timeLimit
      randomSelection
      execution
      instances {
        id
        ...QuestionDataInfo
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    activeBlock {
      id
      __typename
    }
    confusionSummary {
      speed
      difficulty
      numberOfParticipants
      __typename
    }
    feedbacks {
      id
      isPublished
      isPinned
      isResolved
      content
      votes
      createdAt
      resolvedAt
      responses {
        id
        content
        positiveReactions
        negativeReactions
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

  controlSession(id: $id) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    course {
      id
      displayName
      __typename
    }
    blocks {
      id
      order
      status
      expiresAt
      timeLimit
      randomSelection
      execution
      instances {
        id
        ...QuestionDataInfo
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }

      id

      __typename
    }
    __typename

fe16bc8ac7ebe8c4ea42314a6b209843a13a077b:
query GetCourseOverviewData($courseId: String!) {
  getCourseOverviewData(courseId: $courseId) {
    id
    inRandomGroupPool
    participant {
      id
      avatar
      username
      xp
      level
      participantGroups {
        id
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    participation {
      id
      isActive
      __typename
    }
    course {
      id
      displayName
      color
      description
      isGamificationEnabled
      groupDeadlineDate
      isGroupDeadlinePassed
      isGroupCreationEnabled
      maxGroupSize
      preferredGroupSize
      awards {
        id
        order
        type
        displayName
        description
        participant {
          id
          username
          avatar
          __typename
        }
        participantGroup {
          id
          name
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    leaderboard {
      id
      participantId
      username
      avatar
      score
      isSelf
      rank
      level
      __typename
    }
    leaderboardStatistics {
      participantCount
      averageScore
      __typename
    }
    groupLeaderboard {
      id
      name
      score
      rank
      isMember
      __typename
    }
    groupLeaderboardStatistics {
      participantCount
      averageScore
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  participantGroups(courseId: $courseId) {
    id
    name
    code
    averageMemberScore
    groupActivityScore
    score
    messages {
      id
      content
      participant {
        id
        username
        avatar
        __typename
      }
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      __typename
    }
    participants {
      id
      username
      avatar
      score
      isSelf
      level
      rank
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

      ...ElementData

    __typename
  }
  __typename

        grading {

          score
          maxPoints
          feedback
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      groupName
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
